description: Stay organized with quick task capture and clear tracking. Create, review, complete, and delete tasks to keep momentum. Filter by status to focus on what matters now.

capabilities.name: create_task
capabilities.description: Creates a new task with a title and optional due date and description.

capabilities.name: list_tasks
capabilities.description: Lists all current tasks, optionally filtering by completion status.

capabilities.name: update_task_status
capabilities.description: Updates the completion status of an existing task.

capabilities.name: delete_task
capabilities.description: Deletes a task by its ID.
